title: Edith Piaf       - La Vie en Rose (AJA 5307)
description:
[i]Song title program does a really bad job handling accented characters so track list burps a bit, but the MP3 tags and file names are correct.

Regardless, this is an amazing set of songs from the 1999 CD release.  There is another 2005 CD pressing but not sure if mastering changed.

Please search Big Papi French to add more music to your collection.  Or search Big Papi Classic....

- Big Papi
[/i]

[quote="By W. Tappan Lum"]Edith Piaf was famous for her renditions of French cafe songs. This is a very good compolation of the songs of that era.[/quote]
